items.headline: Bayer stock has its best day in 17 years after support from Trump’s solicitor general
items.summary_en: Bayer shares rose as much as 15% on Tuesday after the U.S. solicitor general backed the company’s bid to get the Supreme Court to curtail litigation alleging its Roundup pesticide causes cancer.
